algorithm_technique: Sort clips by start time, then greedily extend the reachable range.
problem_summary_simple: Find the minimum number of video clips to cover a given time duration.
problem_summary_technical: Greedy approach: sort clips, maintain current and maximum reachable time, increment count when current reach is extended.
key_insights: Sorting the clips by their start times is crucial for the greedy approach.
The greedy strategy involves always picking the clip that extends the furthest from the current reachable point.
If at any point the next clip starts after the current reachable point, it's impossible to cover the duration.
